question: Which among the following statements is/are correct about the Angle of Repose?
option1: It is dependent upon the internal coherence of a material
option2: Softer, looser material has a higher angle of repose
option3: Rocks and compressed sediments has a lower angle of repose
answer: It is dependent upon the internal coherence of a material
explanation:
Angle of Repose is the steepest angle that can be assumed by loose fragments on a slope without down slope movement.
Angle of Repose is dependent upon the internal coherence of the material.
Softer, looser material has lower angle of repose.
Rock and compressed sediments have very high angles of repose.
